metadata.synopsis: During another Brainquake Event the Emperor comments once more, this time telling that the Netherbrain causing this because the Absolute is losing control over it.

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: The brain appears to be resisting its masters - it's acting of its own will...?

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: The brain is resisting its masters... Gortash was right. Without all three stones to control it, it's breaking free.

2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
2.text: The brain is resisting its orders... Without all three stones to control it, it will soon start acting on its own will.
